QuestData.Title: Blasted Lands: The Other Side of the World
QuestData.Description: Now here's an interesting one. It says that members of the Horde should talk to Okrilla at Dreadmaul Hold.$B$BHmph! I didn't even know that the Horde held Dreadmaul Hold!$b$bI guess this Okrilla requires help fighting some ogres and the Alliance. You'd think she'd already have her hands full with all the demons down there!$B$BThe best way to Dreadmaul Hold is to cross the Great Sea, then to take the road south from the Swamp of Sorrows.$B$BYou interested?
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Okrilla at Dreadmaul Hold in the Blasted Lands.
